Title: The Importance of Style for Everyone

Content.Knowledge Point: Style is not just for a select few, but for everyone.
Content.Text: Style is for literally every person. If you are not a nudist, style is for you.

Content.Knowledge Point: Style can greatly impact one's life and self-esteem.
Content.Text: Style has had a massive impact on my life and everybody who I work with.

Content.Knowledge Point: Understanding proportions and personal style is crucial for great style.
Content.Text: Know your proportions and know who you are. Know your proportions.

Content.Knowledge Point: Breaking outdated style rules can lead to personal growth.
Content.Text: Let go of your style. If you are a curvy lady and you have hips, you have bosoms, sizable bosoms, it has been encouraged for you to wear A-line dresses or skirts to hide that and to minimize it. That's bull.

Content.Knowledge Point: Age should not limit one's style choices.
Content.Text: Times have changed so greatly. I think that those notions of age are quite outdated and somewhat archaic at this point.

Content.Knowledge Point: Classic pieces are timeless and versatile.
Content.Text: Keep it classic. When in doubt, keep it classic. You can't go wrong.

Content.Knowledge Point: Avoiding certain trends and styles can enhance one's image.
Content.Text: Board shorts are heinous, but Chris Hemsworth wears them and he looks wonderful. I guess if you have the confidence to wear board shorts and you choose to look shorter than you are, so be it. I just think it doesn't do your body any favors.
